reference.title: (LinuxMonitor) Linux Monitor
reference.shortdesc: The ZenPacks.zenoss.LinuxMonitor ZenPack demonstrates how to develop new plugins that collect performance data using Secure Shell.

section.p: This ZenPack demonstrates the Secure Shell (SSH) features, and enables modeling and monitoring several types of device components for devices placed in the /Server/SSH/Linux device class by running commands and parsing the output. Parsing of command output is performed on the server or on a distributed collector. The account used to monitor the device does not require root access or special privileges.
